    • insertItemTiles

      public void insertItemTiles(int column, List<ItemTileType> itemTileList)
      This method inserts on the library the tiles chosen form the player.
      Parameters:
      column - number of the column chosen by the player
      itemTileList - The orderly list of the tiles chosen by the player

    • emptyTilesCounter

      public int emptyTilesCounter(int column)
      This method returns the number of empty tiles in the column.
      Parameters:
      column - the column of the library
      Returns:
      the number of empty tiles in the column

    • getListGroupsAdjacentTiles

      public List<org.javatuples.Pair<ItemTileType,Integer>> getListGroupsAdjacentTiles()
      This method find groups of Adjacent item tiles of the same type on the library. This method can be used to calculate points from the groups of Adjacent tiles and for check CommonCard 1 and 3.
      Returns:
      List of pair (ItemTileType, numberOfTile)

    • getLargestGroupsMap

      public Map<ItemTileType,Integer> getLargestGroupsMap(List<org.javatuples.Pair<ItemTileType,Integer>> listGroupsAdjacentTiles)
      This method find the largest group of Adjacent item tiles of the same type on the library.
      Parameters:
      listGroupsAdjacentTiles - list of pair (ItemTileType, numberOfTile)
      Returns:
      Map of pair (ItemTileType, numberOfTile) with the largest group of Adjacent item tiles of the same type on the library

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Check if the library is full.
      Returns:
      true if library has no ItemTile with type==EMPTY, false otherwise

    • calculateCRC

      public long calculateCRC()
      This method calculates the checksum of the library. It is used to check if the library has been modified.
      Returns:
      the CRC of the library
